meanings.definition: A person or thing that undergoes something.
meanings.sent1: The brave undergoer faced the storm with courage.
meanings.sent2: The patient was the undergoer of the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The little undergoer giggled as the dentist checked their teeth.
meanings.sent4: The caterpillar transformed into a butterfly, a true undergoer of change.
meanings.sent5: The young undergoer's journey through the forest was filled with excitement.

meanings.definition: A participant in an action or process.
meanings.sent1: The eager undergoer joined the team for the project.
meanings.sent2: The student was an active undergoer in the classroom discussion.
meanings.sent3: The curious undergoer asked many questions during the experiment.
meanings.sent4: The seed was a silent undergoer in the growth of the plant.
meanings.sent5: The diligent undergoer contributed greatly to the success of the event.
